title: Perform an Integrated Audit
description: An audit team performs an integrated audit that covers both the financial and IT controls of the revenue cycle.

tasks.description: The financial auditor tests a sample of sales invoices to ensure they were recorded correctly in the general ledger.
The IT auditor tests the application controls in the billing system to ensure that all sales are billed completely and accurately.
tasks.expected_outcome: The IT application controls are tested.

tasks.description: The IT auditor tests the IT general controls over the billing system, such as access and change management.
tasks.expected_outcome: The IT general controls are tested.

tasks.description: The audit team combines their results into a single, integrated report that provides a holistic view of the risks in the revenue cycle.
tasks.expected_outcome: A single, comprehensive report is created.
